Intervention: Vitamin B12: Vitamin B12 2500 micrograms sublingually per day over the course of 90 days (+/- 10 days)
Eligibility: Sign informed consent and Pain level > 4 in the BPI scale,
Results: Percentage Change in Average Joint Pain in Women With Aromatase Inhibitor-associated Musculoskeletal Symptoms (AIMSS) Compared to Baseline as Measured by the Brief Pain Inventory Short Form (BPI-SF).

The Brief Pain Inventory - Short Form (BPI- SF) average pain score used. This item has a scale of 0 to 10 with 0 indicating "No pain" and 10 indicating "Pain as bad as you can imagine" We expect at least 20% improvement in BPI-SF pain scores. Participants were asked to rate worst pain an average pain within the last 24 hours.
Time frame: Baseline and 90 days (+/- 10 days)
Vitamin B12: Vitamin B12 2500 micrograms sublingually per day over the course of 90 days (+/- 10 days)
